title: Methi Malai Khumb Matar
directions: 1. Clean and cut mushrooms. Saute them in butter till dry and golden. Add ginger-garlic paste, salt and white pepper powder. Stir for a minute. Keep them aside.
2. Heat oil. Add onion paste and cook till oil separates.
3. Add the freshly ground powder. Cook for few seconds.
4. Add kasoori methi, cream/malai, salt, red chilli powder, garam masala and amchoor. Stir for a minute.
6. Add milk to get the right consistency. Boil for 2-3 minutes. Ready to eat â˜º
(It's Nita Mehta's recipe. But with my experience, I have modified the quantity of some ingredients.)
ingredients: 1/2 cup thin fresh cream or malai
Grind together - 1/2 stick cinnamon, seeds of 3 green cardamoms, 3 cloves, 8 peppercorns, 8 tbsp cashewnut
